altTitles.ja: 恋人パシリ〜遺伝子の発現にはご注意を〜

description.en:
There’s a late bloomer, and then there’s a *late bloomer*. Doyun may be half Omega, but he certainly doesn’t look it: he’s tall, chiseled… But the worst of it all is that he’s a full-grown adult male who has yet to go into heat. He doesn’t see the problem, and everyone assumes he’s an Alpha, anyway. But when his body finally decides it’s “time,” it just happens to be at the most inopportune moment. He has no-one to turn to but his work rival, Taehan – but thankfully, Taehan is more than man enough to help him out.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/shuttle/), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/shuttle), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000048477), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6856)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/loveshuttle)
* [Japanese](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/pashiri)
description.id:
Ada orang yang lambat pertumbuhannya, dan ada yang benar-benar lambat pertumbuhannya. Doyun memang setengah Omega, tapi dia tidak terlihat seperti itu. Ia bertubuh tinggi, mempunyai rahang tegas… Yang terburuk adalah ia lelaki dewasa yang belum pernah sekalipun mengalami heat. Ia tak merasa ada masalah. Toh semua orang menganggapnya sebagai Alpha. Tapi ketika tubuhnya memutuskan ini 'saatnya', itu terjadi di saat paling tidak disangka. Ia tidak mempunyai siapapun kecuali rival kerjanya, Tae Han. Untungnya Tae Han cukup jantan untuk membantunya.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/shuttle/), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/shuttle), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000048477), [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6856)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/loveshuttle)
* [Japanese](https://www.lezhin.com/ja/comic/pashiri)
